domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

As we start to think #ica21, I believe we are defining what conferences might look like in the next decade+: #hybrid.

One thing is certain about the next 10 months: uncertainty!

Three C's define the trajectory:
Covid | Climate | Cuts (in #highered funding).

Let's make it work! https://t.co/iOpEWGKeMF

Please take time to fill out the #ica20 survey. This is especially important for @icahdq to get a sense of how things went this year and how people are feeling about #ica21. The link is in your email or https://t.co/vaT8hN6F3p

RT @icahdq: Friendly reminder to complete the #ica20 conference survey! Your feedback is very important to us, especially as we begin to pr…
Friendly reminder to complete the #ica20 conference survey! Your feedback is very important to us, especially as we begin to prepare for #ica21.

Check your email: The #ica20 feedback survey is live! Share your thoughts & offer ideas for Denver & #ica21. We may still be dealing with COVIDry and your thoughts about virtual options are helpful for @icahdq 🕹

It's a bit on the long side, but the survey does span many important aspects of the conference experience, with enough open-ended questions to fill the gaps. So taking the time to provide feedback this way is a golden opportunity to weigh in on future conferences. #ica20 #ica21 https://t.co/lFUvLe87eq
